english.segment1: I know that look on your face. I know the secrets you tell. Your every move I can trace. I guess I could say I know you well. But how can I say I know you well
english.segment2: Chorus: Cause when I look in your eyes I see a million miles. across an endless sea. I want to sail the waves and make the great discovery. And when I hold you in my arms. The beating of your heart is calling out to me. Im holding a mystery
english.segment3: How many songs will be sung and how many words will be said. How many stories of love lie deep within you. Waiting to be read. Well I want your story to be read
english.segment5: The beating of your heart. Is calling out to me. Only a God of endless wisdom, love and mercy. Could have created such a wonder as you
